name: Salomon Trailblazer 10L Pack - Unisex
description: This might be the only pack you'll ever need for short trips with minimal gear. The comfortable harness adapts to your body for a snug fit whether you are hiking, running or biking. Lots of pockets keep all your essentials close at hand. Inside there's a sleeve for your hydration reservoir.Lightweight 3D harness wraps around your body for a comfortable fit.Large main compartment has a wide zippered opening for easy access.An external zippered pocket and side stretch pockets keep you organized.Internal compartment holds a 2L hydration reservoir (sold separately)Stretch loops let you attach trekking poles.Clip a blinky light on to the reflective loop for extra nighttime visibility.
